summary: Detective April Marshall investigates a cold case involving an armed robbery and homicide from 2002 after a Glock 17 pistol was found and linked to the case. The investigation leads to Gerald Gillespie, whose property was near the location where the gun was found, and a pocket watch matching a stolen item from the crime scene is discovered in his home. Buccal swabs and fingerprint standards were collected from Mr. Gillespie for forensic analysis.
conclusion: The investigation has linked a firearm found in 2022 to the 2002 cold case, and a pocket watch matching a stolen item from the crime scene was found in Gerald Gillespie's home. Forensic samples were collected for further analysis.
